scripts.build:extension: npx esbuild src/extension/popup-entry.ts --bundle=false --outfile=extension/popup.js --platform=browser --target=chrome90 && npx esbuild src/extension/background.ts --bundle --outfile=extension/background.js --platform=browser --target=chrome90 --external:chrome && npx esbuild src/extension/content.ts --bundle --outfile=extension/content.js --platform=browser --target=chrome90 --external:chrome && npx esbuild src/extension/dashboard-content.ts --bundle --outfile=extension/dashboard-content.js --platform=browser --target=chrome90 --external:chrome
